~ lsc ~ this site is pre-fermenting ~

pre-fermenting: ingredients have been mixed, roughly stirred by hand, water and flour and the magic in the air, this will become something new and the change is rapid but we just have to wait to see when it'll be ready
the work & more about everything else

Fog

Fog is a series of photos exploring things half-seen, as if through a foggy window or a pane of frosted glass. Sometimes, things that are only partially visible can be more intriguing than if they were unobscured.

Used in this piece: Nikon 70D, Lightroom, Procreate

Posted 2019-11-05

Tagged: content , experiment , photography
thanks for being here. you can also find me on instagram and github.
